items.description: Margins remained steady despite elevated commodity prices

items.description: LKP Research is bullish on Axis Bank has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 1395 in its research report dated April 25, 2025.

items.description: The company banks on urban demand revival to drive a turnaround in volume growth

items.title: Live: Will May Series Defy Seasonality? Street Verdict On Axis Bank| RIL Q4 Today | Opening Bell
items.description: Nifty 50 ended its seven-day winning streak on April 24, slipping 0.3% amid F&O expiry-led profit booking. The index remained range-bound, trading within the previous day’s levels, signaling a phase of consolidation. Experts say this pause may extend over the next few sessions, with key support seen at 24,000. But global cues are positive and the GIFT Nifty is hinting at a gap up open today. Axis Bank and Tech Mahindra will react to earnings today. Meanwhile, Reliance Industries and Maruti are the key numbers to watch out for. Catch Nandita Khemka in conversation with Raja Venkatraman, Co-Founder NeoTrader and Market Expert Ambareesh Baliga.

items.title: Agri Picks Report April 25, 2025: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: According to Geojit Financial Services, Sowing of rabi crops in Telangana was at 7.94 million acres (1 acre = 0.4 hectares) as of Wednesday, up 17.2% from 6.77 million acres a year ago, according to a report released by the state agriculture department.

items.title: Hindustan Unilever's strategy to prioritize growth over margins sparks bullish brokerage calls
items.description: Analysts believe the short-term cost will help strengthen Hindustan Unilever’s core brands and improve competitiveness across categories.

items.title: Patel Engineering shares gain 5% on winning projects worth Rs 2,036cr
items.description: Patel Engineering Share Price | The company declared lowest bidder for a Rs 1,318.89 crore contract for the “construction of Kondhane Dam and its allied works” using Roller Compacted Concrete Technology, from CIDCO.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Nifty break below 24000, Sensex tanks 750 pts; all sectors in the red
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: SBI Life Insurance, HDFC Life, Infosys, TCS, Wipro are among major gainers on the Nifty, while losers are Axis Bank, Trent, Bajaj Finance, Bajaj Finserv, Jio Financial.

items.title: First Tick: Here are the top global cues for today’s trade
items.description: US stocks closed higher on Thursday, rallying for a third straight day with a solid boost from technology shares as investors parsed a mixed bag of corporate earnings and watched for signs of progress in the U.S.-China tariff stand-off.

items.title: Stocks to Watch Today: Axis Bank, Tech Mahindra, L&T Tech, Macrotech Developers, Cyient, IEX, Container Corporation in focus on 25 April
items.description: Stocks to Watch, 25 Apr: Stocks like SBI Cards and Payment Services, SBI Life Insurance Company, Aavas Financiers, Tanla Platforms, Nelco, RITES, Power Grid Corporation of India, Wipro, Bannari Amman Spinning Mills, Bharat Heavy Electricals, and Gujarat Industries Power Company will be in focus on April 25.

items.title: Tata Tech's net profit rises 20% to Rs 189 crore in Q4, firm announces interim dividend, special dividend
items.description: Tata Technology announced a final dividend of Rs 8.35 per share and a one-time special dividend of Rs 3.35 per share. This takes the total dividend announced along with the Q4 results to Rs 11.70 per share.

items.title: Taking Stock: Market falls amid geopolitical tension; IT helps Nifty to close above 24,000
items.description: Among sectors, except IT, all other indices ended in the red with media, metal, PSU, telecom, power, oil & gas, realty down 2-3 percent. Broader indices underperformed the main indices with BSE Midcap and smallcap indices falling 2.5 percent each.

items.title: RIL Q4 Results Live: Mukesh Ambani-led firm set to announce March quarter earnings, dividend
items.description: RIL Q4 Results Live: Analysts project a mixed performance as softness in the oil-to-chemicals and oil & gas segment is expected to be offset by a hike in telecom tariffs and improving retail performance.

items.title: Live: Nifty Logs Triple-Digit Cut As Cross-Border Tensions Weigh On Sentiment | Closing Bell
items.description: Nifty recovers 200 points from day's low. Sensex recovers almost 800 points from day's low. Midcap index down 2(%); adv-dec ratio at 1:7. All sectors in red barring Nifty IT index. Pharma, realty, autos among top sectoral laggards. India VIX up nearly 6(%). For the week nifty up 1(%); midcap index up over 2(%). Nifty IT up over 7.5(%) for the week. Catch Nandita Khemka and Yatin Motas as they break down the market action and share the stocks on their radar.

items.title: Sensex, Nifty extend losses for second session as auto, pharma stocks drag; small, midcap indices fall over 2%
items.description: IT was the sole outperformer providing some support to the market in the afternoon

items.title: Q4 Results impact: ACC, Cyient shares tumble 6% amid tepid March quarter earnings
items.description: Axis Capital cut the rating of ACC shares to 'Reduce' from 'Add', with a target price of Rs 2,050 apiece.

items.title: Tech Mahindra sticks to FY27 goals despite macro challenges
items.description: Strong order inflows and a positive margin surprise in Q4FY25, though revenue performance was weak

items.title: Sensex plunges 800 pts, Nifty below 24k as Pahalgam attack fuels geopolitical jitters; small, midcap indices fall 3%
items.description: Tech Mahindra, Infosys, TCS, and IndusInd Bank were among the gainers on benhcmark indices while the broader market mood remained grim with Axis Bank, Adani Ports, Bajaj Finserv, Power Grid, and NTPC leading the slide.

items.title: Co-location-based HFTs, global trading firms lead to 4x jump in share of algo trading in last decade
items.description: Algo-trades encompass over 50% NSE’s cash market volumes and around 40% of BSE's volumes -- witnessing a four-fold jump in the last decade.

items.title: Weekly Tactical Pick: This FMCG major is a play on rural demand recovery
items.description: An expected good monsoon and a robust distribution network should help Dabur do well

items.title: Axis Bank bags optimistic brokerage calls on Q4 profit beat but stock sinks 4% on weak growth outlook
items.description: Axis Bank shares fell over four percent despite reporting an estimate-beating net profit of Rs 7,118 crore for the quarter ended March FY2025.

items.title: Tech Mahindra Q4FY25 earnings signal turnaround, brokerages optimistic
items.description: Brokerages remain optimistic on Tech Mahindra following its Q4FY25 earnings, with a gradual recovery in margins and deal wins supporting the investment case.
